title: ‘Thank you Nicholas Latifi’ – Christian Horner’s greatest quotes
summary: Former Red Bull boss Christian Horner was never lost for words – here are some of his best soundbites from 20 years in F1

qa_pairs.question: Who was the team principal of Red Bull Racing for over 20 years?
